entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 50 gusting to 90 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
